RED BIRD.prompt: so you seek the fabled land of byergur. well.. you will have to find it yourself...

options.text: what can you tell me about byergur?
options.response: byergur is a land of mystery and wonder. it is a land of magic and adventure. it is a land of... well.. you get the idea.
well.. i guess you can go then.

options.text: can you recommend a way to get there?
options.response: i can't help you with that.
you're not all that helpful yourself.
